properties.name: Cambodia Daily
properties.popupContent: I worked at the Cambodia Daily newspaper in Phnom Penh from Oct 2010 to Oct 2011. It was my first reporting job and was nothing if not eventful.
I covered the death of Cambodia's King Sihanouk in 2012, describing the extended mourning period and the cremation rites.
I covered the Cambodian elections during the summer of 2013.
